--- title: "Dash through the cosmos " title-block-banner: true format: html: code-fold: true code-summary: "Show the code" --- Check out this ::: {#10a6d263 .cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd import numpy as np import plotly.express as px import janitor pattern = r"(\d{1,3}(?:,\d{3})*(?:\.\d+)?)" df = pd\ .read_html("https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_natural_satellites")[-2]\ .drop(columns=["Image"])\ .clean_names()\ .assign(discovery_year=lambda x: pd.to_numeric(x['discovery_year'], errors='coerce'), year_announced=lambda x: pd.to_numeric(x['year_announced'], errors='coerce'), numeral=lambda x: pd.to_numeric(x['numeral'].str.extract('(\\d+)', expand=False), errors='coerce'), mean_radius_km=lambda x: pd.to_numeric(x['mean_radius_km_'].str.extract(pattern, expand=False).str.replace(',', ''), errors='coerce'), orbital_semi_km=lambda x: pd.to_numeric(x['orbital_semi_major_axis_km_'].str.extract(pattern, expand=False).str.replace(',', ''), errors='coerce'), sidereal_period=lambda x: pd.to_numeric(x['sidereal_period_d_r_=_retrograde_'].str.extract(pattern, expand=False).str.replace(',', ''), errors='coerce'))\ .drop(columns=['mean_radius_km_', 'orbital_semi_major_axis_km_', 'sidereal_period_d_r_=_retrograde_', 'ref_s_']) ``` ::: ::: {#9c8df748 .cell execution_count=2} ``` {.python .cell-code} df ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=2} ```{=html}
